main event: A military pilot and a civilian witnessed an unidentified object disintegrating in the sky over San Jacinto and Palm Springs, California on December 31, 1952.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be flying horizontally at an altitude of around 25,000 feet.
The object appeared to be the size of a fighter aircraft and was silver in color.
The object was observed to be moving at an extreme speed and disintegrating rapidly.
A fire trail was observed coming from the larger object.
The sighting was reported to the March Air Force Base control tower by a Marine Major flying an F9F2 aircraft at an altitude of 22,000 feet.
sighted object: a disintegrating object resembling a fighter aircraft
location: San Jacinto and Palm Springs, California
witnesses: a military pilot and a civilian
